extends java.lang.Object

      • addItemToInventory

        public void addItemToInventory(User currentUser,
                      Item item)
        add an item to current user's inventory list.
        Parameters:
        currentUser: - current user name.(it's User object here).
        item: - the item current user want to add to the inventory(this method could be used in the trade success part).

        itemCategory: - item category
        itemPrivacy: - item privacy
        itemComment: - item comments

      • editItem

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> editItem(java.util.ArrayList<User> userList,
                                 int currentUserId,
                                 int itemId,
                                 Item newItem)
        edit an item and save it in the current local userList.
        Parameters:
        userList: - current User List
        currentUserId: - current User id
        itemId: - the index of current item
        newItem: - the item that will replace the old one
        Returns:
        a new user list for the future save to the server
